content: शिखरः --रं [शिखा अस्त्यस्य-अरच् आलोपः] {@--1@} The top, summit, or peak of a mountain; जगाम गौरी शिखरं शिखडिमत् <ls>Ku. 5. 7</ls>, <ls n="Ku. 5.">4</ls>; <ls>Me. 18.</ls> {@--2@} The top of a tree. {@--3@} Crest, tuft. {@--4@} The point or edge of a sword. {@--5@} Top, peak, point in general. {@--6@} The arm-pit. {@--7@} Bristling of the hair. {@--8@} The bud of the Arabian jasmine. {@--9@} A kind of ruby-like gem. --रा <ab>N.</ab> of a plant (मूर्वा).

शिखरः --रं [शिखा अस्त्यस्य-अरच् आलोपः] {@--1@} The top, summit, or peak of a mountain; जगाम गौरी शिखरं शिखडिमत् <ls>Ku. 5. 7</ls>, <ls n="Ku. 5.">4</ls>; <ls>Me. 18.</ls> {@--2@} The top of a tree. {@--3@} Crest, tuft. {@--4@} The point or edge of a sword. {@--5@} Top, peak, point in general. {@--6@} The arm-pit. {@--7@} Bristling of the hair. {@--8@} The bud of the Arabian jasmine. {@--9@} A kind of ruby-like gem. --रा <ab>N.</ab> of a plant (मूर्वा).
